abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide: (a) project
            preparation - about 30 man-years of consultant services for
            project preparation and planning activities in support of
            the nation's Three-Year Public Investment Program:
            training and fellowships in project appraisal and
            supervision as well as regional planning; (b) project
            implementation - (i) five man-years of consultant services
            to help strengthen the Institute of Accounting Studies so as
            to produce more and better trained bookkeepers and
            accounting technicians; provision of equipment, furniture,
            and teaching materials as well as fellowships for future
            teachers of the Institute; (ii), two man-years of
            specialized assistance, as well as training, to help
            strengthen the Department of Purchasing in order to
            facilitate tendering and procurement procedures; (iii) six
            man-weeks of consultant services to study the possible
            establishment of an effective monitoring and evaluation
            mechanism within the Ministry of National Planning; (c)
            macro-economic Management - About 27 man-months of
            consultant services to help strengthen the Debt Management
            Unit and the Department of Statistics; some overseas
            training would also be provided for staff of the Debt
            Management Unit.
